entry.title: Tuesday: Light snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Light snow ending early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 14 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Tuesday 27 December 2022
